1: %% Author: jens
    2: %% Created: 29 mar 2013
    3: -module(hty_percentencoding_SUITE).
    4: 
    5: -export([all/0, decode_square_brackets/1, decode_latin1/1]).
    6: 
    7: %%
    8: %% Include files
    9: %%
   10: 
   11: %%
   12: %% Exported Functions
   13: %%
   14: all() -> [
   15: 	decode_square_brackets,
   16: 	decode_latin1
   17: ].
   18: 
   19: decode_square_brackets(_Cfg) ->
   20: 	Input = <<"%5Blim/%5D">>,
   21: 	Facit = <<$[, "lim/", $]>>,
   22: 	Facit = hty_percentencoding:decode(Input).
   23: 
   24: decode_latin1(_Cfg) ->
   25: 	Input = <<"LIM%5Br%e4ksm%f6rg%e5s/%5DBOLLHAV">>,
   26: 	Facit = <<"LIM[räksmörgås/]BOLLHAV">>,
   27: 	Facit = hty_percentencoding:decode(Input).
